name: The Roscoe: Who's Ya Daddy?
description: Who’s Ya Daddy? Is a clicker game that differs from most related titles, not only in its incorrect subject matter, but also in a fast-flowing gameplay. Taking the role of the titular „daddy” you’ll have to stay on your toes, handpick the money earned by your girls and boys, take care of your respect on the streets, which will minimize the risk of violence and take care of giving bribes. All this is decorated with dirty, comic graphics, which makes our title one of a kind.
